author: Dr. V. Ramasubramanian
title: Lessons from a pandemic: It’s OK to be smart
description: It probably began in the East and crossed borders and oceans, as it devastated several countries till it reached Rome. The only thing that spread faster than the contagion was the fear and the rumours
content:
I
t probably began in the East and crossed borders and oceans, as it devastated several countries till it reached Rome. The only thing that spread faster than the contagion was the fear and the rumours. People were terror-stricken. Doctors were clueless. Gov… [+9375 chars]
